column4: what's the command to install a .deb? the wiki page on it is 404'd
thanks, does it have to be anywhere in particular?
you can write it like dpkg -i /path/to/debfile
so you can do it from any directory
or look from system monitor if it's there and kill it!
using the run command in gnome nothing appears to happen
well then, do a ps -A | grep nautilus
you might have to use sudo
I found out what triggers it, if I right click on an icon then go to properties nautilus crashes
yah, nautilus is kind of buggy
